com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.app
Class WPDialog

java.lang.Object
  Dialog
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.app.WPDialog

public class WPDialog
extends Dialog

Themed dialog that offers the option of two bottom buttons, a negative and positive button (ie. confirm, cancel), and the ability to set a title and inner layout/ message. This dialog can hold 0 - 2 buttons and will appear in the order in which they are set. If you call setNegative*() before setPositive*() then the negative button will be left and the positive button to the right.

Change Log: Version 1.01

  • Fixes for orientation and repeated displaying.
  • General display bugs...
Version 1.02
  • Broadcasting of Intent.
Version 2.0
  • Full support for the light & dark theme.

Since:
06-11-2012

setVerticalOffset

public void setVerticalOffset(int offset)
Must be called before the dialog is shown! Offset it by a specific number of pixels. This does NOT work if the dialog is full screen!
